reviewText:
GOLD CONNECTION also known as Iron Dragon Strikes Back (1979) starring Bruce Li and Philip Ko.
Bruce Li and friends find a stash of triad gold. Gangsters seeks out the gold and Bruce & friends are forced to go on the run. A good modern-day ('70s) action film with a great ending.

The Vengeance Video DVD (PAL Region 0) has decent picture quality and is more or less widescreen, with Mandarin audio & English subtitles.
